meanings: (그렇게 하면) and, then, if you do (so)
(그렇다고 하면) then, in that case, if (it is) so, if that's the case
I knew it, No wonder, There is no doubt that
I knew it, No wonder, There is no doubt that
(관용)as (was[had been]) expected,It should be so.,I thought so!
